title: Five-Star Mallorca Palace Heritage with Rooftop Plunge Pool & Daily Breakfast
description:
For upscale sophistication, bygone grandeur and fashionable living in the heart of Mallorca's sun-soaked Palma, Summum Prime Boutique Hotel awaits your arrival. Housed within the walls of a former 15th-century palace, this designer hotel effortlessly blends old-world avant-garde architecture with island character. Stroll the medieval streets and discover an abundance of galleries, restaurants and bars, and bask in the Mediterranean sunshine by the harbour as you watch the boats come and go.

Return to relax and unwind after days spent exploring the beloved beachside city within fashionably furnished private rooms, cozy and warm lounge areas and a restorative spa. Grab a pick-me-up tipple and sumptuous Spanish fare at 1874 Lounge Bar & Terrace, and later on, bask in the Mediterranean sun with a side of sea breeze in the glittering rooftop pool.
offer_address: Carrer de la Concepciò 26, 07012, Palma de Mallorca, Spain

title: Adults-Only, Five-Star Stay In the Balearic Islands
description: Live the island life in utter style, staying at Hotel Es Princep-Mallorca's most charming hotel, located in the heart of Palma’s historic and lively centre. Despite only opening earlier this year, the hotel has already been added to the growing list of Leading Hotels of the World due to its grand Balearic luxury and prime location. Enjoy a three, four or seven-night stay overlooking the Mediterranean Sea and enjoy daily breakfast, a decadent a la carte dinner for two, welcome drink for two, access to the hotel’s luxurious Coco Spa Oasis and more.
offer_address: Carrer Bala Roja, 1, 07001 Palma, Illes Balears, Spain

title: Boutique Spanish Five-Star Retreat in the Heart of Palma with Ocean-View Rooftop Terrace
description: Say hola to the largest of the Balearic Islands with a stay at the award-winning, five-star Hotel Es Princep - tucked within the city walls of Palma’s Old Town. A recipient of the 2023 Conde Nast Award for Excellence, this boutique gem is the perfect place to spend a few days in the sun and discover the enchanting island off the coast of Spain. Bask in the Mediterranean sun with a side of sea breeze on the stunning rooftop terrace, feast on local flavours at Zaranda and experience mind-clearing relaxation at Coco Spa Oasis.
offer_address: Calle Bala Roja 1, Palma de Mallorca, 07001, Spain
